author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower tray & compensation board tips…I used a Schluter adaptor ring over a clamping ring drain. Then I placed 1 inch compensation boards on the plywood with ALL-SET underneath. This allows me to use the Schluter shower tray and the bonding flange drain that comes with the adaptor. It’s a great option for converting a shower clamping ring drain/liner system to a Schluter System. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#showerremodel #bathroomremodel #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Shower Tray & Compensation Board Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #brandpartner
